title: @Riot this is unfrair my frend gets no prize for the tournament we played
body: We were signing on your page with him at the same time he showed me how i should sing up and now your shit system is saying that he didint sigh up we tryharded 2 days for that reward this is bullshit i demand a explanation for this my frend soloed their top laner 1000 times so we can get 4th place he is pissed as fuck and i am too {{champion:78}}

replies.body: We can't really address tournament issues here on H&S, but if you and your friend submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll be happy to hook you up with a specialist that can take a look at what happened.
hope the specialist dosent just say you have no proof and ditch us :'(
srsly if this is true he should get his rewards..
@Targons Blade i sent a gmail message to your tournament email i hope you help me ..
riot come on not this shizzle again GIVE THAT GODLIKE TOPLANER SOME RP I KNOW HIM IN REAL LIFE AND HES A GREAT GUY ACTUALLY WATCHED HIM PLAY RIOT JUST GIVE IT TO HIM

Our toplaner.The god.The player who solo killed many top laners in the tournament.He is now sad,thanks to you Riot Games.Your system is broken and it needs to be fixed.He was signed up for the tournament(we can even show proof of that) and he will not receive 400 RP.I don't know what to say but this is really sad and bad.

{{champion:78}} {{item:3070}}
we demand a rioter to see this
